DOC.detailed_description: This study collect clinical information pediatric patient 0-18 year old undergoing upper gastrointestinal endoscopy due general complaint . The demographic , clinical symptom , endoscopy , pH monitoring , histology data assess diagnostic process . In baseline endoscopy procedure sample ( blood , saliva , esophageal tissue , esophageal mucus ) take . After diagnostic process EoE Gastroesophageal reflux disease ( GERD ) support International Guidelines patient divide three group - EoE , GERD , Control . The technique use patient characterization assessment : 1 . Symptoms score : General symptom score and/or Pediatric Eosinophilic Esophagitis Symptom Score ( PEESS v2.0 ) - translate adapted version Brazilian Portuguese 2 . Endoscopic Score : Eosinophilic Esophagitis ( EoE ) Endoscopic Reference Score ( EREFS ) 3 . Peak eosinophil count ( PEC ) histological feature description 4 . Proteomic analyse 5 . Microbiome analyse 6 . Immunohistochemistry analysis
